name: War Pigs
description:
Summary

An action strategy pig game where you play as a legion of militant Roman Pigs, sent to conquer the villages of Germanic Boars.  Capture prisoners, loot their homes, defeat their leader Boarminius!  Bring Glory to the Roman Pig Empire!

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #33
https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-33

Source Code

https://github.com/BVenturaDev/War-Pigs

Credits

Ben Ventura - Oeslian: Project Lead, Programming, Character Art / Animations

Vikfro: Music, Sound Effects, Audio/UI Programming

Jonas:  Programming, Level Design

Munro: Design and Testing

All the assets have been made specifically for this game during the jam, except for
- most sounds which are from the GameAudioGDC bundle by Soniss (https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc)

- this cha-ching sound Freesound - "cha ching.wav" by creek23
- this coins sound Freesound - "Coins - 01.wav" by DWOBoyle
- the sword & shield icon used for the logo by Icongeek26 (https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/weapons_4054757)
- Particles from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack
- Roboto Bold font https://www.dafont.com/roboto.font
- This font for menus https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Josefin+Slab
